1.name: Battleship Potemkin
1.description: In the midst of the Russian Revolution of 1905, the crew of the battleship Potemkin mutiny against the brutal, tyrannical regime of the vessel's officers. The resulting street demonstration in Odessa brings on a police massacre.

2.name: The Phantom of the Opera
2.description: A mad, disfigured composer seeks love with a lovely young opera singer.

3.name: The Gold Rush
3.description: A prospector goes to the Klondike in search of gold and finds it and more.

4.name: Ben-Hur: A Tale of the Christ
4.description: A Jewish prince seeks to find his family and revenge himself upon his childhood friend who had him wrongly imprisoned.

5.name: The Lost World
5.description: The first film adaptation of Sir Arthur Conan Doyle's classic novel about a land where prehistoric creatures still roam.

6.name: The Big Parade
6.description: A young American soldier witnesses the horrors of the Great War.

7.name: The Wizard of Oz
7.description: Dorothy, heir to the Oz throne, must take it back from the wicked Prime Minister Kruel with the help of three farmhands.

8.name: The Freshman
8.description: A nerdy college student will do anything to become popular on campus.

9.name: The Pleasure Garden
9.description: Patsy Brand is a chorus girl at the Pleasure Garden music hall. She meets Jill Cheyne who is down on her luck and gets her a job as a dancer. Jill is engaged to adventurer Hugh Fielding and...                See full summary »

10.name: Seven Chances
10.description: A man learns he will inherit a fortune if he marries by 7 p.m. that same day.

11.name: Stachka
11.description: A group of oppressed factory workers go on strike in pre-revolutionary Russia.

12.name: Master of the House
12.description: When a man becomes tyrannical towards his family, the women of the house decide to teach him a lesson in gratitude.

13.name: Pretty Ladies
13.description: Maggie, a headlining comedienne with the Follies, takes a fall off the stage into the orchestra pit and lands on the drum of musician Al Cassidy. One thing leads to another, they fall in ...                See full summary »

14.name: The Merry Widow
14.description: A prince must woo the now wealthy dancer he once abandoned in order to keep her money in the country in order to keep it from crashing economically.

15.name: Stage Struck
15.description: A young woman dreams of becoming a great actress. When her boyfriend starts to flirt with an actual actress, she becomes jealous and decides to fight with her rival.

16.name: Go West
16.description: With little luck at keeping a job in the city a New Yorker tries work in the country and eventually finds his way leading a herd of cattle to the West Coast.

17.name: The Monster
17.description: A meek clerk who doubles as an amateur detective investigates some very strange goings-on at a remote mental sanitarium.

18.name: Tartuffe
18.description: Young man shows his millionaire grandfather a film based on Molière's Tartuffe, in order to expose the old man's hypocritical governess who covets his own inheritance.

19.name: Maciste in Hell
19.description: The devil takes Maciste down to hell in an attempt to corrupt and ruin his morality.

20.name: Little Annie Rooney
20.description: The tenements are home to an international community, including the friends and family of a tough young ragamuffin named Annie Rooney, but their neighborhood may be threatened by a dangerous street gang.

21.name: Variety
21.description: Prologue: The murderer "Boss" Huller - after having spent ten years in prison - breaks his silence to tell the warden his story. "Boss", a former trapeze artist, and his wife own a cheap ...                See full summary »

22.name: Lady of the Night
22.description: A world-weary prostitute yearns after respectability and the love of an inventor.

23.name: The Plastic Age
23.description: Hugh Carver is an athletic star and a freshman at Prescott College. He falls in love with Cynthia Day, a popular girl who loves to go to parties. He finds that it is impossible to please ...                See full summary »

24.name: The Eagle
24.description: A wanted Russian lieutenant becomes a masked vigilante seeking vengeance upon the man who stole his family's land, only to fall for his charming daughter.

25.name: The Joyless Street
25.description: Vienna in the biggest depression, directly after WW1. In a slum, Lila Leid, the wife of lawyer Leid is murdered, Egon, secretary of one of Leid's clients is arrested. He was with her, and ...                See full summary »

26.name: Stella Dallas
26.description: Stella Dallas is a small town girl who marries the upper class Stephen Dallas, with whom she has nothing in common. After the birth of a daughter, Laurel, the Dallases go their separate ...                See full summary »

27.name: The Unholy Three
27.description: A sideshow ventriloquist, midget, and strongman form a conspiracy known as "The Unholy Three" and commit a series of robberies.

28.name: Body and Soul
28.description: A minister is malevolent and sinister behind his righteous facade. He consorts with, and later extorts from, the owner of a gambling house, and betrays an honest girl, eventually driving ...                See full summary »

29.name: Sally, Irene and Mary
29.description: The three are showgirls, each with a different approach to life and love. Sally wants wealth and gets it finally in Marcus. Mary plots and schemes but winds up with salt-of-the-earth Jimmy....                See full summary »

30.name: Riders of the Purple Sage
30.description: A Texas Ranger searches for his kidnapped sister.

31.name: Lady Windermere's Fan
31.description: A society woman believes her husband is having an affair, a misconception which may have dire personal consequences for all involved.

32.name: She
32.description: In Africa an explorer is the reincarnated lover of the 2,000-year-old White Queen.

33.name: Orochi
33.description: The story of a decent samurai who is widely considered a scum and a criminal. His bad luck and numerous misunderstandings drag him down the social ladder straight to the gutter.

34.name: The Vanishing American
34.description: History, as portrayed in this film, has been a succession of conquests of stronger races over weaker ones. As played out on the stage of Monument Valley, long ago, tribes of Indians ...                See full summary »

35.name: Whirlpool of Fate
35.description: After her father's death and her uncle having drunk all the inheritance, Virginia is left alone. She is accepted by a family of bohemians but a quarrel between the bohemians and the ...                See full summary »

36.name: Wege zu Kraft und Schönheit - Ein Film über moderne Körperkultur
36.description: The perfect body as an object of cult worship. Based on the mass sports and body worship movement of the 1920s, the film propagates physical training and shows in stylized documentary ...                See full summary »

37.name: Don Q Son of Zorro
37.description: Don Cesar, son of Zorro, is framed for murder while visiting Spain, and becomes the whip-wielding outlaw Don Q.

38.name: The Circle
38.description: Elizabeth Cheney has a wealthy husband, social prominence and everything she could want in life . . . except Ted Lutton, the man she loves. Now, she must decide whether to give up ...                See full summary »

39.name: Visages d'enfants
39.description: A man whose wife has died remarries, and his new wife has a daughter of her own from a previous marriage. The man's young son, however, who loved his mother deeply and misses her terribly, ...                See full summary »

40.name: North Star
40.description: Melodrama about a man who heads into the Northwest after he mistakenily believes he has killed another man and is followed there by his sister.

41.name: Braveheart
41.description: Chief Standing Rock's tribe has a treaty protecting their fishing grounds, but a canning corporation is violating the treaty through intimidation and force. The tribe is divided as to how ...                See full summary »

43.name: The Red Kimona
43.description: A small town girl finds escape from her cruel home life in the arms of a handsome stranger. Soon she finds herself working as a prostitute in New Orleans, desperately clinging to the belief that he really loves her.

45.name: The Dark Angel
45.description: The Dark Angel tells the story of three childhood friends, two male, one female. When the woman chooses one of the men to marry, the other, jealous, sends his rival off into a dangerous situation during wartime.

46.name: Kentucky Pride
46.description: The story of a Beaumont race horse, told through from the point of view of the horse via intertitles.

47.name: Dick Turpin
47.description: About a vicious highway man in the 1700's

48.name: Madame Sans-Gêne
48.description: A French washerwoman becomes a duchess and a friend of Napoleon.

49.name: The Wanderer
49.description: 1925 film directed by Raoul Walsh and starring Greta Nissen, Wallace Beery and Tyrone Power, Sr.. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures.

50.name: The Tower of Lies
50.description: After his beloved daughter leaves for the city to pay off his debt, an old farmer goes mad when her letters become less frequent and it is suspected she may be using her body to get the money.
